extensions.name: Core Set
extensions.description: The <italic>X-Wing Second Edition Core Set</italic> contains two TIE/ln fighter miniatures and one T-65 X-wing miniature, along with all of the maneuver templates, dials, cards, dice, and rules that you need to play the game.

card_list.name: •Luke Skywalker
card_list.subtitle: Red Five
card_list.ability_text: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

card_list.name: Black Squadron Ace
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The elite TIE/ln pilots of Black Squadron accompanied Darth Vader on a devastating strike against the Rebel forces at the Battle of Yavin.</flavor>

card_list.name: Obsidian Squadron Pilot
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The TIE fighter’s Twin Ion Engine system was designed for speed, making the TIE/ln one of the most maneuverable starships ever mass-produced.</flavor>

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Galactic Empire uses the fast and agile TIE/ln, developed by Sienar Fleet Systems and produced in staggering quantity, as its primary starfighter.</flavor>

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Heightened Perception
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

card_list.name: Instinctive Aim
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to ignore the <focus> or <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Sense
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0–1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>, you may choose a ship at range 0–3 instead.

card_list.name: Supernatural Reflexes
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: R2 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: R5 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: •R2-D2
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •R5-D8
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: Servomotor S-foils (Open)
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

back_side.name: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

extensions.name: Saw’s Renegades
extensions.description: With the <italic>Saw’s Renegades Expansion Pack</italic> you’ll find two new ship miniatures—a U-wing and a T-65 X-wing, both pre-painted in the stunning black-and-white paint scheme of Saw Gerrera’s freedom fighters.

card_list.name: •Kullbee Sperado
card_list.subtitle: Enigmatic Gunslinger
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, you may flip your equipped <config> upgrade card.

card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: •Death Troopers
card_list.ability_text: During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0–1 cannot remove stress tokens.

card_list.name: •Director Krennic
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, assign the <smallcaps>Optimized Prototype</smallcaps> condition to another friendly ship.

card_list.name: ISB Slicer
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1–2 cannot remove jam tokens.

extensions.name: Rebel Alliance Conversion Kit
extensions.description: The <italic>Rebel Alliance Conversion Kit</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition offers the cards, tokens, dials, and bases that you need to convert your first edition collection of Rebel Alliance ships to the game's second edition.

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Another successful Corellian Engineering Corporation freighter design, the VCX-100 is larger than the ubiquitous YT-series, boasting more living space and customizability.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Tail Gun:</sabold> While you have a docked ship, you have a primary <reararc> weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship’s primary <frontarc> attack value.</shipability>

card_list.name: Wild Space Fringer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Although stock YT-2400 light freighters have plenty of room for cargo, that space is often annexed to support modified weapon systems and oversized engines.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Sensor Blindspot:</sabold> While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0–1, do not apply the range 0–1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.</shipability>

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Saturation Salvo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

card_list.name: Selfless
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to cancel 1<nonbreak><crit> result.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Advanced Sensors
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Dorsal Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

card_list.name: Ion Cannon Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Skilled Bombardier
card_list.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

card_list.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, you may perform a bonus primary <reararc> attack.

card_list.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack using a <turretarc> you did not already attack from this round.

card_list.name: R2 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: R4 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

card_list.name: R5 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: •Cloaking Device
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <cloak> action.<return>At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a <focus> result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

card_list.name: Contraband Cybernetics
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Deadman’s Switch
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Feedback Array
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Inertial Dampeners
card_list.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Advanced SLAM
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Engine Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: •Baze Malbus
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <focus> action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0–1, to a maximum of 2.

card_list.name: •C-3PO
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many <evade> results, add 1<nonbreak><evade> result.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform the <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •Cassian Andor
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1–2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship’s dial. If the chosen ship’s bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

card_list.name: •Chewbacca
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge> to repair 1 faceup damage card.

card_list.name: •“Chopper”
card_list.ability_text: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

card_list.name: •Hera Syndulla
card_list.ability_text: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: •Jyn Erso
card_list.ability_text: If a friendly ship at range 0–3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

card_list.name: •Kanan Jarrus
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range 0–2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

card_list.name: •Lando Calrissian
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Roll 2 defense dice. For each <focus> result, gain 1 focus token. For each <evade> result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

card_list.name: •Leia Organa
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 <standardcharge>. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

card_list.name: •Nien Nunb
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers (<leftbank> and <rightbank>).

card_list.name: •R2-D2
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a <hit> result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

card_list.name: •Sabine Wren
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. <return>After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

card_list.name: •“Zeb” Orrelios
card_list.ability_text: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.

card_list.name: •Bistan
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack against a ship you have not already attacked this round.

card_list.name: •Ezra Bridger
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a bonus <turretarc> attack from a <turretarc> you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: •Han Solo
card_list.ability_text: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a <turretarc> attack. You cannot attack from that <turretarc> again this round.

card_list.name: •Luke Skywalker
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: •“Chopper”
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1 non-recurring <nonbreak><standardcharge> from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring <standardcharge> on an equipped upgrade.

card_list.name: •<italic>Ghost</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or <italic>Sheathipede</italic>-class shuttle.<return>Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

card_list.name: •<italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

card_list.name: •<italic>Moldy Crow</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Gain a <frontarc> primary weapon with a value of “3.”<return>During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

card_list.name: •<italic>Outrider</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an obstructed attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.<return>After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

card_list.name: •<italic>Phantom</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock at range 0–1.

card_list.name: Pivot Wing (Open)
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

back_side.name: Pivot Wing (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.<Return>After you execute a [0<nonbreak><stop>] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90º or 180º.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

card_list.name: Servomotor S-foils (Open)
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

back_side.name: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: Galactic Empire Conversion Kit
extensions.description: The <italic>Galactic Empire Conversion Kit</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition offers the cards, tokens, dials, and bases that you need to convert your first edition collection of Galactic Empire ships to the game's second edition.

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Ruthless
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0–1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Saturation Salvo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Advanced Sensors
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Trajectory Simulator
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Dorsal Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

card_list.name: Ion Cannon Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Barrage Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 or more <standardcharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Skilled Bombardier
card_list.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

card_list.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack using a <turretarc> you did not already attack from this round.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Advanced SLAM
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: •Admiral Sloane
card_list.ability_text: After another friendly ship at range 0–3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens.<return>While a friendly ship at range 0–3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: •Agent Kallus
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, assign the <smallcaps>Hunted</smallcaps> condition to 1 enemy ship.<return>While you perform an attack against the ship with the <smallcaps>Hunted</smallcaps> condition, you may change 1 of your <focus> results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: •Ciena Ree
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <coordinate> action, if the ship you coordinated performed a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90°.

card_list.name: •Darth Vader
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

card_list.name: •Emperor Palpatine
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

card_list.name: •Grand Inquisitor
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship at range 0–2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: •Grand Moff Tarkin
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge>. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

card_list.name: •Minister Tua
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red <reinforce> action.

card_list.name: •Moff Jerjerrod
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge>. If you do, choose the [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red <boost> action using that template.

card_list.name: •Seventh Sister
card_list.ability_text: If an enemy ship at range 0–1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

card_list.name: •Fifth Brother
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change 1 of your <focus> results to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: •<italic>Dauntless</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
card_list.ability_text: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform <torpedo> and <missile> attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack.<return>Add <torpedo> and <missile> slots.

card_list.name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
card_list.ability_text: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform <cannon> attacks. While you perform a <cannon> attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice.<return>Add <cannon> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>ST-321</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <coordinate> action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0–3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: Scum and Villainy Conversion Kit
extensions.description: The <italic>Scum and Villainy Conversion Kit</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition offers the cards, tokens, dials, and bases that you need to convert your first edition collection of Scum ships to the game's second edition.

card_list.name: •Boba Fett
card_list.subtitle: Notorious Bounty Hunter
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0–1.

card_list.subtitle: Captain of the Binayre Pirates
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 friendly non-limited ship at range 0 of the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.ability_text: You can perform <frontarc> special attacks from your <reararc>.<return>While you perform a special attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Bounty Hunter
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The <untalic>Firespray</untalic>-class patrol craft is infamous for its association with the deadly bounty hunters Jango Fett and Boba Fett, who packed their craft with countless deadly armaments.</flavor>

card_list.name: Shadowport Hunter
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Crime syndicates augment the lethal skills of their loyal contractors with the best technology available, like the fast and formidable <untalic>Lancer</untalic>-class pursuit craft.</flavor>
card_list.maneuvers_data: {"5": [null, null, {"name": "straight", "color": 1}, null, null, null, null, {"name": "kturn", "color": 3}], "4": [null, null, {"name": "straight", "color": 2}, null, null, null, null, null], "3": [{"name": "leftturn", "color": 2}, {"name": "leftturn", "color": 2}, {"name": "straight", "color": 2}, {"name": "rightturn", "color": 2}, {"name": "rightturn", "color": 2}, null, null, null], "2": [{"name": "leftturn", "color": 1}, {"name": "leftbank", "color": 1}, {"name": "straight", "color": 2}, {"name": "rightbank", "color": 1}, {"name": "rightturn", "color": 1}, null, null, null], "1": [null, {"name": "leftbank", "color": 1}, {"name": "straight", "color": 1}, {"name": "rightbank", "color": 1}, null, null, null, null], "0": [null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]}

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Fearless
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s <frontarc>, you may change 1 of your results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Saturation Salvo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Advanced Sensors
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Trajectory Simulator
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Dorsal Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

card_list.name: Ion Cannon Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Skilled Bombardier
card_list.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

card_list.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, you may perform a bonus primary <reararc> attack.

card_list.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack using a <turretarc> you did not already attack from this round.

card_list.name: R2 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: R4 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

card_list.name: R5 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: •Cloaking Device
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <cloak> action.<return>At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a <focus> result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

card_list.name: Contraband Cybernetics
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Deadman’s Switch
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Feedback Array
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Inertial Dampeners
card_list.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Advanced SLAM
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Engine Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: •4-LOM
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

card_list.name: •Boba Fett
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Start in reserve.<return>At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

card_list.name: •Cad Bane
card_list.ability_text: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red <boost> action.

card_list.name: •Cikatro Vizago
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 <illicit> upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0–1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.<return><smallcaps>End of Game:</smallcaps> Return all <illicit> upgrades to their original ships.

card_list.name: •IG-88D
card_list.ability_text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the <sabold>IG-2000</sabold> upgrade.<return>After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.

card_list.name: •Jabba the Hutt
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, that ship recovers 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> on 1 of its equipped <illicit> upgrades.

card_list.name: •Ketsu Onyo
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

card_list.name: •Latts Razzi
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/<focus> results to an <evade> result.

card_list.name: •Maul
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.<return>You can equip “Dark Side” upgrades.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Ezra Bridger

card_list.name: •Unkar Plutt
card_list.ability_text: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to perform 1 white action.

card_list.name: •Zuckuss
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

card_list.name: •Bossk
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

card_list.name: •BT-1
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result for each stress token the defender has.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: •Dengar
card_list.ability_text: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a <hit> or <crit> result, the attacker suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: •Greedo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.<return>While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, the attacker may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: •“Genius”
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

card_list.name: •R5-P8
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack against a defender in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a <crit> result, suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage.

card_list.name: •R5-TK
card_list.ability_text: You can perform attacks against friendly ships.

card_list.name: •<italic>Andrasta</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add <bomb> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Havoc</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Remove <crew> slot. Add <sensor> and <astro> slots.

card_list.name: •<italic>Hound’s Tooth</italic>
card_list.ability_text: 1 Z-95-AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

card_list.name: <italic>IG-2000</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the <sabold>IG-2000</sabold> upgrade.

card_list.name: •<italic>Mist Hunter</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add <cannon> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Punishing One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <frontarc>, roll 1 additional attack die.<return>Remove <crew> slot. Add <astro> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Shadow Caster</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your <turretarc> and your <frontarc>, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

card_list.name: •<italic>Slave I</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal a turn (<leftturn> or <rightturn>) or bank (<leftbank> or <rightbank>) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction.<return>Add <torpedo> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Virago</italic>
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a red <boost> action.<return>Add <mod> slot.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: T-65 X-wing
extensions.description: The <italic>T-65 X-Wing Expansion Pack</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition includes a beautifully-painted T-65 X-wing miniature for you to add to your squadron, a maneuver dial, and all the ship and upgrade cards you need to fly this iconic starfighter into battle.

card_list.name: •Wedge Antilles
card_list.subtitle: Red Two
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: •Thane Kyrell
card_list.subtitle: Corona Four
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><focus>, <hit>, or <crit> result to look at the defender’s facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

card_list.name: •Garven Dreis
card_list.subtitle: Red Leader
card_list.ability_text: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1–3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

card_list.name: •Biggs Darklighter
card_list.subtitle: Red Three
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> damage to cancel 1 matching result.

card_list.name: Red Squadron Veteran
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Created as an elite starfighter squad, Red Squadron includes some of the best pilots in the Rebel Alliance.</flavor>

card_list.name: Ruthless
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0–1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Heightened Perception
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

card_list.name: Supernatural Reflexes
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

extensions.name: Slave I
extensions.description: The <italic>Slave I Expansion Pack</italic> includes a beautifully pre-painted ship miniature along with a maneuver dial and all the ship cards and upgrade cards you need to supplement your squadron with this versatile ship.

card_list.name: •Boba Fett
card_list.subtitle: Notorious Bounty Hunter
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0–1.

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The <untalic>Firespray</untalic>-class patrol craft is infamous for its association with the deadly bounty hunters Jango Fett and Boba Fett, who packed their craft with countless deadly armaments.</flavor>

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, you may perform a bonus primary <reararc> attack.

card_list.name: Inertial Dampeners
card_list.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

card_list.name: •Boba Fett
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Start in reserve.<return>At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

card_list.name: •<italic>Andrasta</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add <bomb> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Marauder</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary <reararc> attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.<return>Add <gunner> slot.

card_list.name: •<italic>Slave I</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal a turn (<leftturn> or <rightturn>) or bank (<leftbank> or <rightbank>) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction.<return>Add <torpedo> slot.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: Fang Fighter
extensions.description: The <italic>Fang Fighter Expansion Pack</italic> includes a fully pre-painted Fang Fighter miniature, a maneuver dial, and all the ship cards, upgrade cards, and tokens you need to add one of these deadly starfighters to your squadron.

card_list.name: •Fenn Rau

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Fearless
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s <frontarc>, you may change 1 of your results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

extensions.name: Lando's Millennium Falcon
extensions.description: The Lando's <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic> Expansion Pack contains a fully-assembled, pre-painted customized YT-1300 light freighter miniature, including a detachable Escape Craft miniature that can be piloted as a separate ship. In addition Expansion Pack contains two maneuver dials and all the ship cards and upgrade cards you need to supplement your squadron with this pair of versatile ships.

card_list.name: Freighter Captain
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Many spacers make a living traveling the Outer Rim, where the difference between smuggler and legitimate merchant is often murky. On the outskirts of civilization, buyers are rarely so discerning to ask where merchandise came from, at least as long as the price is low enough.</flavor>

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: Composure
card_list.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

card_list.name: •Chewbacca
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

card_list.name: •L3–37
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attacker must reroll all attack dice.

back_side.name: •L3–37’s Programming
back_side.ability_text: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank (<leftbank> and <rightbank>) maneuvers.

card_list.name: •Lando Calrissian
card_list.ability_text: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

card_list.name: •Tobias Beckett
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

card_list.name: •Qi’ra
card_list.ability_text: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

card_list.name: Agile Gunner
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: •Han Solo
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may perform a red <focus> action.

card_list.name: •Lando’s <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
card_list.ability_text: 1 Escape Craft may dock with you.<return>While you have an escape craft docked, you may treat its shields as if they were on your ship card.<return>While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

extensions.name: First Order Conversion Kit
extensions.description: The <italic>First Order</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition offers the cards, tokens, dials, and bases that you need to convert your first edition collection of First Order ships to the game's second edition.

card_list.subtitle: Alert Flight Controller
