card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Advanced Sensors
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: Fanatical
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Advanced Optics
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Hyperspace Tracking Data
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup.<return>After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2.

card_list.name: Pattern Analyzer
card_list.ability_text: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

card_list.name: Primed Thrusters
card_list.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform <barrelroll> and <boost> actions even while stressed.

card_list.name: Targeting Synchronizer
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 1–2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the<nonbreak><targetlock> attack requirement.

card_list.name: •Captain Phasma
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0–1 that is not stressed gains 1 stress token.

card_list.name: •General Hux
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <coordinate> action, you may treat it as red. If you do, you may coordinate up to 2 additional ships of the same ship type, and each ship you coordinate must perform the same action, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: •Kylo Ren
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Choose 1 enemy ship at range 1–3. If you do, spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to assign the <smallcaps>I’ll Show You the Dark Side</smallcaps> condition to that ship.

card_list.name: •Petty Officer Thanisson
card_list.ability_text: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your <frontarc> at range 0–1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

card_list.name: •Supreme Leader Snoke
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships beyond range 1. If you do, spend that many <forcecharge> to flip each chosen ship’s dial faceup.

card_list.name: Special Forces Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, if your <turretarc> is in your <frontarc>, you may roll 1<nonbreak>additional attack die.<return>After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, if your <turretarc> is in your <reararc>, you may perform a bonus primary <turretarc> attack.

card_list.name: Biohexacrypt Codes
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate or jam, if you have a lock on a ship, you may spend that lock to choose that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

extensions.name: Resistance Conversion Kit
extensions.description: The <italic>Resistance Conversion Kit</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition offers the cards, tokens, dials, and bases that you need to convert your first edition collection of Resiatance ships to the game's second edition.

card_list.name: •Poe Dameron
card_list.subtitle: Trigger-Happy Flyboy
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a white action, treating it as red.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

The starfighter’s advanced droid socket is compatible with a wide array of astromechs, and its modular weapons pods allow ground crews to tailor its payload for specific missions.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Advanced Sensors
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Trajectory Simulator
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Skilled Bombardier
card_list.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

card_list.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack using a <turretarc> you did not already attack from this round.

card_list.name: R2 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: R4 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

card_list.name: R5 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: Contraband Cybernetics
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Deadman’s Switch
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Feedback Array
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Inertial Dampeners
card_list.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Advanced SLAM
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Engine Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Advanced Optics
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Hyperspace Tracking Data
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup.<return>After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2.

card_list.name: Pattern Analyzer
card_list.ability_text: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

card_list.name: Primed Thrusters
card_list.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform <barrelroll> and <boost> actions even while stressed.

card_list.name: Targeting Synchronizer
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 1–2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the<nonbreak><targetlock> attack requirement.

card_list.name: Heroic
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

card_list.name: •C-3PO
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have<nonbreak><calculate> on their action bar.<return>After you perform the<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><coordinate> action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: •Chewbacca
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return>After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 is dealt 1<nonbreak>damage card, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return>While you perform an attack, you may spend 2<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><crit> result.

card_list.name: •Han Solo
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an <evade> action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0–1.

card_list.name: •Rose Tico
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.

card_list.name: •Finn
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship is in your <frontarc>, you may add 1 blank result to your roll (this die can be rerolled or otherwise modified).

card_list.name: •Paige Tico
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may drop 1 bomb or rotate your <turretarc>.<return>After you are destroyed, you may drop 1 bomb.

card_list.name: •Rey
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in your <turretarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change 1 of your blank results to a <evade> or <hit> result.

card_list.name: •BB-8
card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll> or<nonbreak><boost> action.

card_list.name: BB Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <barrelroll> action.

card_list.name: •M9-G8
card_list.ability_text: While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

card_list.name: •R2-HA
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

card_list.name: •R5-X3
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

card_list.name: •<italic>Black One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Then you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token.<return>If your <standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot perform the <slam> action.

card_list.name: •Rey’s <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
card_list.ability_text: If you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can execute red Segnor’s Loop [<leftsloop> or <rightsloop>] maneuvers and perform <boost> and<nonbreak><rotate> actions even while stressed.

card_list.name: Integrated S-foils (Open)
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

back_side.name: Integrated S-foils (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your <bullseye>, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

extensions.name: RZ-2 A-wing
extensions.description: The <italic>RZ-2 A-wing Expansion Pack</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition includes a beautifully-painted RZ-2 A-wing miniature for you to add to your squadron, and with the included dial, ship and upgrade cards it gives you everything you need to stand toe-to-toe with the First Order’s best!

card_list.subtitle: Luminous Mentor
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if you are stressed, you <bold>must</bold> roll 1 fewer defense die or 1 additional attack die.<return><shipability><sabold>Refined Gyrostabilizers:</sabold> You can rotate your <turretarc> indicator only to your <frontarc> or <reararc>. After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> or red <rotate> action.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

card_list.name: Ferrosphere Paint
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship’s <bullseye>, that ship gains 1 stress token.

extensions.name: Mining Guild TIE
extensions.description: The <italic>Mining Guild TIE Expansion Pack</italic> includes one beautifully pre-painted miniature and all the ship and upgrade cards you need to supplement your own mining operations and keep the profits flowing.

card_list.name: •Foreman Proach
card_list.subtitle: Slave Driver
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may choose 1<nonbreak>enemy ship in your <bullseye> at range 1–2 and gain 1 disarm token. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.<return><shipability><sabold>Notched Stabilizers:</sabold> While you move, you ignore asteroids.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>As part of its arrangement with the Empire, the Mining Guild receives modified TIE/ln Fighters to protect its operations. card_list.name: Elusive
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

extensions.name: T-70 X-wing
extensions.description: The <italic>T-70 X-Wing Expansion Pack</italic> for X-Wing Second Edition includes a beautifully-painted T-70 X-wing miniature for you to add to your squadron, a maneuver dial, and all the ship and upgrade cards you need to grow your Resistance forces.

card_list.subtitle: Trigger-Happy Flyboy
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a white action, treating it as red.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll> or<nonbreak><boost> action.

card_list.ability_text: While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

card_list.name: •<italic>Black One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Then you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token.<return>If your <standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot perform the <slam> action.

back_side.name: Integrated S-foils (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your <bullseye>, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

card_list.name: Zeta Squadron Pilot
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Unhampered by a cumbersome galactic bureaucracy, technologies originally researched by the Empire’s TIE Advanced program are now mass-produced on First Order starfighters. As a result, TIE/fo pilots enjoy higher survival rates than their predecessors in the Galactic Empire.</flavor>

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Fanatical
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Advanced Optics
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Targeting Synchronizer
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 1–2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the<nonbreak><targetlock> attack requirement.

extensions.name: Servants of Strife
extensions.description: This <italic>Squadron Pack</italic> contains everything you need to add one Belbullab-22 Starfighter and two <italic>Vulture</italic>-class Droid Fighter ships to your games of <italic>X-Wing</italic>, including three dials, several tokens, new ship cards and a wealth of upgrade cards—including reprints of many common neutral upgrade cards.

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Composure
card_list.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

card_list.name: Treacherous
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may choose a ship obstructing the attack and spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, cancel 1 <hit> or <crit> result, and the ship you chose gains 1 strain token.<return>After a ship at range 0–3 is destroyed, recover 1 <standardcharge>.

card_list.name: •TV-94
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 performs a primary attack against a defender in its <bullseye>, if there are 2<nonbreak>or fewer attack dice, it may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token to add 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: •Kraken
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 3<nonbreak>friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0–3. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: Energy-Shell Charges
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<calculate>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. While you perform this attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <crit> result.<return><smallcaps>Action</smallcaps>: Reload this card.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •<italic>Soulless One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is outside your firing arc, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.

card_list.name: Impervium Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would be dealt a faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to discard it instead.

card_list.name: Grappling Struts (Open)
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range 0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1 stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90º in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

back_side.name: Grappling Struts (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

extensions.name: Guardians of the Republic
extensions.description: This <italic>Squadron Pack</italic> gives you everything you need to begin building your Galactic Republic squadrons, including one Delta-7 Aethersprite miniature, two V-19 Torrent miniatures, three dials, a plentiful amount of tokens, several new Force upgrade cards, and a wealth of other upgrade cards—including reprints of many common neutral upgrade cards.

card_list.name: •Obi-Wan Kenobi
card_list.subtitle: Guardian of the Republic
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2 spends a focus token, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship gains 1<nonbreak>focus token.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Fine-tuned Controls:</sabold> After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <boost> or <barrelroll> action.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: •Lone Wolf
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

card_list.name: Marksmanship
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Saturation Salvo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: R4 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

card_list.name: R5 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

card_list.name: Static Discharge Vanes
card_list.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Composure
card_list.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

card_list.name: Predictive Shot
card_list.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

card_list.name: Brilliant Evasion
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to change 2 of your <focus> results to <evade><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: Dedicated
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship in your <leftarc><nonbreak>or <rightarc> at range<nonbreak>0–2 defends, if it is limited or has the <smallcaps>Dedicated</smallcaps> upgrade and you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token. If you do, the defender rerolls 1<nonbreak>of their blank results.

card_list.name: Battle Meditation
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You cannot coordinate limited ships.<return> While you perform a purple <coordinate> action, you may coordinate 1 additional friendly non-limited ship of the same type. Both ships must perform the same action.</smallbody>

card_list.name: R4-P Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a basic maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, while you execute that maneuver, reduce its difficulty.

card_list.name: •R4-P17
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform an action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Delta-7B
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Delta-7B was designed as a heavier variant of the Delta-7 <untalic>Aethersprite</untalic>-class Interceptor, identifiable by the repositioned astromech slot. Many Jedi Generals favor this craft’s greater firepower and durability.</flavor>

card_list.name: Calibrated Laser Targeting
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if<nonbreak>the defender is in your <bullseye>, add 1<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: Spare Parts Canisters
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1<nonbreak>charge on one of your equipped <astro> upgrades. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

card_list.name: Synchronized Console
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the <smallcaps>Synchronized Console</smallcaps> upgrade at range 1–3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

extensions.name: Sith Infiltrator
extensions.description: In this <italic>Expansion Pack</italic>, you’ll find a collection of five ship cards, including Darth Maul himself, twenty upgrade cards that help you fully utilize the ship’s systems, and all the tokens and maneuver dials you need to launch your own secret missions.

card_list.name: •Darth Maul
card_list.subtitle: Sith Assassin
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may spend 2 <forcecharge> to perform a bonus primary attack against a different target. If your attack missed, you may perform that bonus primary attack against the same target instead.

card_list.name: Dark Courier
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The vessel called the <untalic>Scimitar</untalic> was heavily modified, equipped with stealth technologies and advanced surveillance devices for infiltration and assassination missions.</flavor>

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Hate
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many <forcecharge>.

card_list.name: Predictive Shot
card_list.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

card_list.name: Brilliant Evasion
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to change 2 of your <focus> results to <evade><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: •K2-B4
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token. If it does, add 1 <evade> result unless the attacker chooses to gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.

card_list.name: •Darth Sidious
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a purple<nonbreak><coordinate><nonbreak>action, the ship you coordinated gains 1<nonbreak>stress token. Then, it gains 1<nonbreak>focus token or recovers 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

back_side.name: •Chancellor Palpatine
back_side.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>After you defend, if the attacker is at range 0–2, you may spend 1 <forcecharge>. If you do, the attacker gains 1 stress token.<return>During the End Phase, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •Count Dooku
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before a ship at range<nonbreak>0–2 rolls attack or defense dice, if all of your <forcecharge> are active, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> and name a result. If the roll does not contain the named result, the ship must change 1<nonbreak>die to that result.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •General Grievous
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if there are 2 or more <hit>/<crit> results, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1 <hit> or <crit><nonbreak>result. <return>After a friendly ship is destroyed, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: •DRK-1 Probe Droids
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop or launch 1<nonbreak>DRK-1 probe droid using a speed 3 template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: •<italic>Scimitar</italic>
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After the Place Forces step, you may cloak.<return>After you decloak, you may choose an enemy ship in your <bullseye>. If you do, it gains 1<nonbreak>jam token.</smallbody>

extensions.name: <italic>Vulture</italic>-class Droid Fighter
extensions.description: The <italic>Vulture</italic>-class Droid Fighter Expansion Pack contains a beautifully pre-painted <italic>Vulture</italic>-class droid fighter miniature. Additionally, five ship cards give you the ability to outfit your droid fighter with distinct types of programming while five upgrade cards provide even more freedom to shape your squadron.

card_list.name: Separatist Drone
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>As the Clone Wars escalate, the Separatist Alliance continues to develop the technology of droid starfighters, as well as the tactical droids that command them.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Networked Calculations:</sabold> While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to an <evade> or <hit> result.</shipability>

card_list.name: Grappling Struts (Open)
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range 0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1 stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90º in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

back_side.name: Grappling Struts (Closed)
back_side.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

card_list.name: •••Discord Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token and 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to launch 1<nonbreak>buzz droid swarm using the [3<nonbreak><leftbank>], [3<nonbreak><straight>], or [3<nonbreak><rightbank>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

extensions.name: Delta-7 <italic>Aethersprite</italic>
extensions.description: With five ship cards—including four unique pilots—the <italic>Delta-7</italic> Aethersprite <italic>Expansion Pack</italic> adds even more Jedi for you to include in your Galactic Republic squadrons, including the legendary Anakin Skywalker. This expansion also features six upgrade cards designed to get even more out of your ship and its Jedi pilots.

card_list.name: •Anakin Skywalker
card_list.subtitle: Hero of the Republic
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After you fully execute a maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your <frontarc> at range<nonbreak>0–1 or in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to remove 1<nonbreak>stress token.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Fine-tuned Controls:</sabold> After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <boost> or <barrelroll> action.</shipability>

card_list.name: Jedi Knight
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>When the Clone Wars began, the Jedi Knights rallied to the cause of preserving the Republic, assuming command of legions of clone troopers and leading them in battle.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Fine-tuned Controls:</sabold> After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <boost> or <barrelroll> action.</shipability>

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: Brilliant Evasion
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to change 2 of your <focus> results to <evade><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: Battle Meditation
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You cannot coordinate limited ships.<return> While you perform a purple <coordinate> action, you may coordinate 1 additional friendly non-limited ship of the same type. Both ships must perform the same action.</smallbody>

card_list.name: R4-P Astromech
card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a basic maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, while you execute that maneuver, reduce its difficulty.

card_list.name: Delta-7B
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Delta-7B was designed as a heavier variant of the Delta-7 <untalic>Aethersprite</untalic>-class Interceptor, identifiable by the repositioned astromech slot. Many Jedi Generals favor this craft’s greater firepower and durability.</flavor>

card_list.name: Calibrated Laser Targeting
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if<nonbreak>the defender is in your <bullseye>, add 1<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>result.

extensions.name: ARC-170 Starfighter
extensions.description: With the <italic>ARC-170 Starfighter Expansion Pack</italic>, you can bring a single ARC-170 starfighter to your <italic>X-Wing</italic> battles. Alongside the beautifully painted ARC-170 miniature, you'll find six clone pilots ready to fly for the Republic as well as 14 upgrade cards giving you the freedom to add additional heavy weaponry, gunners, and crew members to your ship.

card_list.name: •“Odd Ball”
card_list.subtitle: CC-2237
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your <bullseye>, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2 in your <leftarc> or <rightarc> performs a primary attack, it may reroll 1<nonbreak>attack die.

card_list.name: Squad Seven Veteran
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Clone Flight Seven serves as part of the Open Circle Fleet under legendary Jedi Generals such as Plo Koon and Obi-Wan Kenobi, and won glory at the battles of Coruscant and Cato Neimoidia.</flavor>

card_list.name: 104th Battalion Pilot
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The ARC-170 was designed as a dominating heavy escort fighter with powerful front and rear lasers, ordnance, and an astromech for navigation. Squadrons of these mighty ships bolster the Republic Navy’s presence at any battle where they are deployed.</flavor>

card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Perceptive Copilot
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

card_list.name: Seasoned Navigator
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, you may perform a bonus primary <reararc> attack.

card_list.name: R3 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

card_list.name: •Darth Sidious
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a purple<nonbreak><coordinate><nonbreak>action, the ship you coordinated gains 1<nonbreak>stress token. Then, it gains 1<nonbreak>focus token or recovers 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

back_side.name: •Chancellor Palpatine
back_side.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>After you defend, if the attacker is at range 0–2, you may spend 1 <forcecharge>. If you do, the attacker gains 1 stress token.<return>During the End Phase, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Dedicated
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship in your <leftarc><nonbreak>or <rightarc> at range<nonbreak>0–2 defends, if it is limited or has the <smallcaps>Dedicated</smallcaps> upgrade and you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token. If you do, the defender rerolls 1<nonbreak>of their blank results.

card_list.name: •R4-P44
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your <bullseye>, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: •Clone Commander Cody
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack that missed, if 1<nonbreak>or more <hit>/<crit> results were neutralized, the defender gains 1<nonbreak>strain token.

card_list.name: Seventh Fleet Gunner
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While another friendly ship performs a primary attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, the attacker rolls 1<nonbreak>additional die, to a maximum of 4. During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Synchronized Console
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the <smallcaps>Synchronized Console</smallcaps> upgrade at range 1–3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

extensions.name: TIE/sk Striker
extensions.description: With the <italic>TIE/sk Striker Expansion Pack</italic>, you have a new option for rounding out your Imperial squadrons. In addition to the fully assembled, pre-painted TIE/sk striker miniature, five pilots stand ready to swoop into battle and protect the Empire, while five upgrade cards give you the chance to further customize your squadrons.

card_list.name: •“Duchess”
card_list.subtitle: Urbane Ace
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You may choose not to use your <sabold>Adaptive Ailerons</sabold>. <return>You may use your <sabold>Adaptive Ailerons</sabold> even while stressed.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

card_list.name: Intimidation
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Trick Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.name: Skilled Bombardier
card_list.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: Z-95-AF4 Headhunter
extensions.description: The <italic>Z-95-AF4 Headhunter Expansion Pack</italic> includes everything you need to add one Z-95-AF4 Headhunter ship to your squadron, including a miniature with a stunning new paint scheme, four ship cards, five upgrade cards, and a handful of tokens.

card_list.name: •N’dru Suhlak
card_list.subtitle: Hunt Saboteur
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, roll 1 additional attack die.

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The vast and influential Black Sun crime syndicate can always find a use for talented pilots, provided they aren’t particular about how they earn their credits.</flavor>

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet’s gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependable—even by other criminals.</flavor>

card_list.name: Crack Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Deadman’s Switch
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Munitions Failsafe
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

extensions.name: Naboo Royal N-1 Starfighter
extensions.description: In addition to the beautifully detailed and pre-painted miniature, the <italic>Naboo Royal N-1 Starfighter Expansion Pack</italic> contains six ship cards, seven upgrade cards that give you greater control over the ship's prodigious speed, and the tokens and maneuver dial you need to defend Naboo or any other planet.

card_list.name: •Ric Olié
card_list.subtitle: Bravo Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is higher than the enemy ship’s, roll 1<nonbreak>additional die.<return><shipability><sabold>Full Throttle:</sabold> After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may perform an <evade><nonbreak>action.</shipability>

card_list.name: Daredevil
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: R2 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

card_list.name: Passive Sensors
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While your<nonbreak><standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your <standardcharge> is inactive, you may perform a<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><targetlock> action.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Plasma Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

card_list.name: •R2-A6
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a maneuver of the same bearing of a speed 1<nonbreak>higher or lower.

card_list.name: •R2-C4
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>evade token to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit><nonbreak>result.

extensions.name: <italic>Hyena</italic>-class Droid Bomber
extensions.description: Compatible with Vulture< swarm tactics, Hyena-class bombers add lethal new layers to Separatist squadrons. Within the <italic>Hyena-class Droid Bomber Expansion Pack</italic>, you'll find everything you need to add some heavy firepower to your Separatist Alliance squadrons, including six ship cards, 10 upgrade cards, and two Quick Build cards.

card_list.name: Trajectory Simulator
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

card_list.name: Barrage Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 or more <standardcharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Passive Sensors
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While your<nonbreak><standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your <standardcharge> is inactive, you may perform a<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><targetlock> action.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Plasma Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

card_list.name: •Diamond-Boron Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, each ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 of the defender with agility equal to or less than the defender's rolls 1<nonbreak>attack die and suffers 1<nonbreak><hit>/<crit> damage for each matching result.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •TA-175
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> on its action bar is destroyed, each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> in its action bar gains 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: •Electro-Proton Bomb
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return><smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template. Then place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.</smallbody><return><smallbody>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Delayed Fuses
card_list.ability_text: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.

card_list.name: Landing Struts (Closed)
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1<nonbreak>or fewer other friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

back_side.name: Landing Struts (Open)
back_side.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range<nonbreak>0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1<nonbreak>stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90° in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

extensions.name: Resistance Transport
extensions.description: The <italic>Resistance Transport Expansion Pack</italic> contains a custom-built shuttle used by the Resistance as a troop carrier and gunship. In addition to both Resistance Transport ship and Resistance Transport Pod ship miniatures, you'll also find several high-ranking Resistance officers ready to join your crew, eight pilots prepped for battle, and four Quick Build cards to help you jump into the fight right away.

card_list.name: •Cova Nell
card_list.subtitle: Evacuation Escort
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if your revealed maneuver is red, roll 1<nonbreak>additional die.
