card_list.name: Expert Handling
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Composure
card_list.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

card_list.name: •R2-HA
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

card_list.name: •R5-X3
card_list.ability_text: Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

card_list.name: Spare Parts Canisters
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1<nonbreak>charge on one of your equipped <astro> upgrades. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

card_list.name: Autoblasters
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die. During the Neutralize Results step, if you are not in the defender’s<nonbreak><frontarc>, <evade><nonbreak>results do not cancel <crit><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: Plasma Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

card_list.name: •Amilyn Holdo
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2. You may transfer to that ship 1 token of a type that ship does not have. That ship may transfer 1 token to you of a type you do not have.

card_list.name: •GA-97
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may spend 3–5<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, choose another friendly ship and assign the <smallcaps>It’s the Resistance</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: •Kaydel Connix
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a basic maneuver of the next higher speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

card_list.name: •Korr Sella
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, remove all of your stress tokens.

card_list.name: •Larma D’Acy
card_list.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, and<nonbreak><jam> actions, even while stressed.<return>While you perform a white<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, or <jam> action, if you are stressed, treat that action as red.

card_list.name: •Leia Organa
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, the chosen ship reduces the difficulty of that maneuver.

card_list.name: •PZ-4CO
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1<nonbreak>friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2.  If you do, transfer 1<nonbreak>calculate token to that ship.  If your revealed maneuver is blue, you may transfer 1 focus token instead.

card_list.name: Angled Deflectors
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Starfighter shields often have manual overrides that allow them to be angled for increased front or rear protection. However, doing so leaves the ship exposed if the pilot’s situational awareness falters.</flavor>
card_list.restrictions_raw: Small or medium ship, Shield value of<nonbreak>1<nonbreak>or<nonbreak>more.

extensions.name: A/SF-01 B-wing
extensions.description: The <italic>B-Wing Expansion Pack</italic> contains a stunning miniature at 1/270 scale, a maneuver dial, all necesssary tokens, four ship cards, and a devastating arsenal of five upgrade cards.

card_list.name: •Braylen Stramm
card_list.subtitle: Blade Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Electronic Baffle
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

extensions.name: VT-49 Decimator
extensions.description: With the <italic>VT-49 Decimator Expansion Pack</italic>, you can bring a single VT-49 Decimator to your Galactic Empire squadrons. In addition to one pre-painted and finely detailed VT-49 miniature, you’ll also find three ship cards, as well as a selection of thirteen reprinted upgrade cards, giving you the freedom to add vital crew and deadly devices to your ship.

card_list.name: •Darth Vader
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

card_list.name: •Grand Inquisitor
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship at range 0–2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

card_list.name: •Seventh Sister
card_list.ability_text: If an enemy ship at range 0–1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

card_list.name: •Fifth Brother
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change 1 of your <focus> results to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: •<italic>Dauntless</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

extensions.name: TIE/sf Fighter
extensions.description: Equipped with a Heavy Weapon Turret that can be rotated between its front and rear arcs, the TIE/sf is a threat from multiple angles. On top of the TIE/sf miniature, the <italic>TIE/sf Fighter Expansion Pack</italic> also contains four TIE/sf ship cards identical to those in the First Order Conversion Kit, six upgrade cards, and two new Quick Build cards.

extensions.name: TIE Silencer
extensions.description: The <italic>TIE/vn Silencer Expansion Pack</italic> gives you everything you need to add one of these menacing ships to your First Order squadrons. Featuring a beautifully re-sculpted TIE/vn silencer miniature, this pack also contains six ship cards identical to the TIE/vn silencer ship cards found in the First Order Conversion Kit along with reprints of five upgrade cards uniquely tailored to take advantage of the silencer's capabilities.

extensions.name: <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
extensions.description: With the <italic>Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack</italic> you can fly this iconic ship into battle. Featuring a Modified YT-1300 Light Freighter ship miniature blasting off with a striking engine glow, this expansion also contains four YT-1300 ship cards identical to those found in the Rebel Alliance Conversion Kit and reprints of fourteen essential upgrade cards, inviting you to make your own personal modifications. Finally, two Quick Build Cards provide suggestions for combinations of pilots and upgrades, helping you get into the battle even sooner.

card_list.name: •Han Solo
card_list.subtitle: Scoundrel for Hire
card_list.ability_text: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0–1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

card_list.name: Outer Rim Smuggler
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Known for its durability and modular design, the YT-1300 is one of the most popular, widely used, and extensively customized freighters in the galaxy.</flavor>

card_list.name: Swarm Tactics
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Engine Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

card_list.name: •C-3PO
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many <evade> results, add 1<nonbreak><evade> result.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform the <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •Chewbacca
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge> to repair 1 faceup damage card.

card_list.name: •Lando Calrissian
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Roll 2 defense dice. For each <focus> result, gain 1 focus token. For each <evade> result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

card_list.name: •Leia Organa
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 <standardcharge>. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

card_list.name: •Nien Nunb
card_list.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers (<leftbank> and <rightbank>).

card_list.name: •R2-D2
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a <hit> result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

card_list.name: •Han Solo
card_list.ability_text: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a <turretarc> attack. You cannot attack from that <turretarc> again this round.

card_list.name: •Luke Skywalker
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: •<italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

extensions.name: <italic>Nantex</italic>-class Starfighter
extensions.description: Dancing nimbly on invisible threads, the <italic>Nantex</italic>-class starfighter utilizes an advanced tractor array to perform impossible maneuvers and guide its turret-mounted laser cannon with exceptional precision. Within this expansion, you’ll find six ship cards, six upgrade cards, two Quick Build cards, several tokens and a maneuver dial to get you flying this unique ship as soon as possible.

card_list.name: •Sun Fac
card_list.subtitle: Archduke’s Enforcer
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, roll 1<nonbreak>additional attack die.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Pinpoint Tractor Array:</sabold> You cannot rotate your <turretarc> to your <reararc>. After you execute a maneuver, you may gain 1<nonbreak>tractor token to perform a<nonbreak><rotate><nonbreak>action.</shipability>

card_list.name: Juke
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

card_list.name: Stealth Device
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Ensnare
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, if you are tractored, you may choose 1<nonbreak>ship in your <turretarc><nonbreak>arc at range<nonbreak>0–1. Transfer 1<nonbreak>tractor token to it.

card_list.name: Gravitic Deflection
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die for each tractored ship in<nonbreak>the attack arc.

card_list.name: Snap Shot
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

card_list.name: Targeting Computer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Targeting computers are standard features on many vessels, especially those designed to deliver ordnance. Some light starfighters and transport craft lack such weapons guidance, though it can be installed as an after-market modification.</flavor>

extensions.name: BTL-B Y-wing
extensions.description: Designed with an armored hull for extra durability and a bubble turret to keep enemies at bay, the Republic’s BTL-B Y-wing can run escort missions or lead an attack. The BTL-B Y-Wing Expansion Pack contains everything you need to add one of these formidable ships to your Galactic Republic squadrons, including a BTL-B Y-wing miniature, eight ship cards, ten upgrade cards, and four Quick Build cards.

card_list.name: •Anakin Skywalker
card_list.subtitle: Hero of the Republic
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your <frontarc> at range<nonbreak>0–1 or in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to remove 1<nonbreak>stress token.<return><shipability><sabold>Plated Hull:</sabold> While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.</shipability>

card_list.name: Ion Cannon Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: •Electro-Proton Bomb
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return><smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template. Then place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.</smallbody><return><smallbody>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Delayed Fuses
card_list.ability_text: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.

card_list.name: Snap Shot
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

card_list.name: Foresight
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> You may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Precognitive Reflexes
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><boost><nonbreak>action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on<nonbreak>your action bar, gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: •Ahsoka Tano
card_list.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> and choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–3 in your firing arc. If you do, it may perform a red<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: •C-3PO
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are calculating, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.<return>After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: •C1-10P
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a red<nonbreak><evade><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.</smallbody><return><smallbody>During the End Phase, if this card has 0<nonbreak> active <standardcharge>, flip it.</smallbody>

back_side.name: •C1-10P (Erratic)
back_side.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you <bold>must</bold> choose a ship at range<nonbreak>0–1. It<nonbreak>gains 1<nonbreak>jam token.

extensions.name: Ghost and Phantom II
extensions.description: The durable VCX-100 light freighter and nimble <italic>Sheathipede</italic>-class shuttle can fight as a docked pair or split up to attack from multiple angles. When helmed by heroes like Hera Syndulla, Kanan Jarrus, and Ezra Bridger, these ships can be some of the greatest assets of the Rebellion. New players will also find eight ship cards, sixteen upgrade cards, four Quick Build cards and more to get this powerful pair of ships into the battle right away.

card_list.name: •Fenn Rau
card_list.subtitle: Reluctant Rebel
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before an enemy ship in your firing arc engages, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify dice while it performs an attack during this phase.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Comms Shuttle:</sabold> While you are docked, your carrier ship gains <coordinate>. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a <coordinate> action.</shipability>

card_list.name: Collision Detector
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

card_list.name: Dorsal Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

card_list.name: Ion Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Tactical Scrambler
card_list.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: •“Chopper”
card_list.ability_text: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

card_list.name: •Hera Syndulla
card_list.ability_text: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: •Kanan Jarrus
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range 0–2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

card_list.name: •“Zeb” Orrelios
card_list.ability_text: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.

card_list.name: •“Chopper”
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1 non-recurring <nonbreak><standardcharge> from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring <standardcharge> on an equipped upgrade.

card_list.name: •<italic>Ghost</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or <italic>Sheathipede</italic>-class shuttle.<return>Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

card_list.name: •<italic>Phantom</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock at range 0–1.

card_list.name: •Maul
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.<return>You can equip “Dark Side” upgrades.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Ezra Bridger

card_list.name: Agile Gunner
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: Hate
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many <forcecharge>.

card_list.name: Predictive Shot
card_list.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

extensions.name: Inquisitor's TIE
extensions.description: An experimental craft reserved for elite agents of the Empire such as the dreaded Inquisitors, the TIE Advanced v1 has numerous cutting-edge features that skilled pilots can leverage to deadly effect. This expansion pack includes everything you need to add one TIE Advanced v1 ship to your Imperial squadrons, including four ship cards, five upgrade cards, as well as two Quick Build cards to get you off the ground even faster.

card_list.name: •Grand Inquisitor
card_list.subtitle: Master of the Inquisitorious
card_list.ability_text: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to prevent the range 1 bonus. <return>While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 2–3, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to apply the range 1 bonus.

card_list.name: Heightened Perception
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

card_list.name: Proton Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

card_list.name: Afterburners
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Hate
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many <forcecharge>.

card_list.name: Predictive Shot
card_list.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

extensions.name: Punishing One
extensions.description: Within the <italic>Punishing One Expansion Pack</italic>, you’ll find everything you need to add one JumpMaster 5000 to your Scum and Villainy squadrons. Reprints of three pilots join Dengar in the pursuit of profit while twelve reprinted upgrade cards give new players plenty of options for putting a personal touch on their ships. Finally, two Quick Build cards offer useful combinations of pilots and upgrades to maximize your JumpMaster 5000’s effectiveness.

card_list.name: •Dengar
card_list.subtitle: Vengeful Corellian
card_list.ability_text: After you defend, if the attacker is in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: •Latts Razzi
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/<focus> results to an <evade> result.

card_list.name: •Dengar
card_list.ability_text: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a <hit> or <crit> result, the attacker suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: •R5-P8
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack against a defender in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a <crit> result, suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage.

card_list.name: •<italic>Punishing One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <frontarc>, roll 1 additional attack die.<return>Remove <crew> slot. Add <astro> slot.

extensions.name: M3-A Interceptor
extensions.description: The M3-A Interceptor is a light, maneuverable craft favored by cartels and syndicates, thanks to the modular hardpoint that lets it equip destructive torpedoes, powerful cannons, and other weapons to threaten much larger vessels. In addition to a miniature with a new and striking Black Sun color scheme, the pack contains eight ship cards, five upgrade cards and four Quick Build cards that help you jump into battle right away.

card_list.name: •Serissu
card_list.subtitle: Flight Instructor
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

extensions.name: <italic>Hound's Tooth</italic>
extensions.description: The <italic>Hound’s Tooth Expansion Pack</italic> contains everything you need to start your own bounty hunting career, including a YV-666 light freighter miniature and a Z-95-AF4 Headhunter miniature painted in the striking Nashtah Pup scheme. Joining these miniatures are six ship cards—four for the YV-666 and two for the Z-95-AF4 Headhunter—and fourteen upgrade cards. Finally, three Quick Build Cards give you even more options for deploying your YV-666.

card_list.name: •<italic>Nashtah Pup</italic>
card_list.subtitle: Contingency Plan
card_list.ability_text: You can deploy only via emergency deployment, and you have the name, initiative, pilot ability, and ship <standardcharge> of the friendly, destroyed <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>.<return><shipability><sabold>Escape Craft:</sabold> <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps>Requires the <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>. You <bold>must</bold> begin the game docked with the <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>.</shipability>

card_list.name: Trandoshan Slaver
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The spacious triple-decker design of the YV-666 makes it popular among bounty hunters and slavers, who often retrofit an entire deck for prisoner transport.</flavor>

card_list.name: •Squad Leader
card_list.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

card_list.name: Tractor Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Homing Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

card_list.name: Freelance Slicer
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

card_list.name: •Informant
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

card_list.name: Tactical Officer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

card_list.name: Feedback Array
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: •Cikatro Vizago
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 <illicit> upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0–1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.<return><smallcaps>End of Game:</smallcaps> Return all <illicit> upgrades to their original ships.

card_list.name: •Jabba the Hutt
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, that ship recovers 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> on 1 of its equipped <illicit> upgrades.

card_list.name: •Bossk
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

card_list.name: •BT-1
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result for each stress token the defender has.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: •Greedo
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.<return>While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, the attacker may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: •<italic>Hound’s Tooth</italic>
card_list.ability_text: 1 Z-95-AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

extensions.name: TIE/in Interceptor
extensions.description: The <italic>TIE/in Interceptor Expansion Pack</italic> gives you the chance to put the legendary Soontir Fel and three other pilots at the controls of this swift and deadly craft. Joining them are five upgrade cards that give these elite pilots even more advantages in the thick of a space battle. Finally, two Quick Build cards provide useful combinations of pilots and upgrades, allowing you to test all of the TIE/in interceptor’s capabilities.

card_list.name: •Soontir Fel
card_list.subtitle: Ace of Legend
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your <bullseye>, gain 1 focus token.<return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

card_list.name: Outmaneuver
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

card_list.name: Predator
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

card_list.name: Hull Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

card_list.name: Shield Upgrade
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

extensions.name: TIE/D Defender
extensions.description: Within the <italic>TIE/D Defender Expansion Pack</italic>, you’ll find everything you need to bulk up your Imperial squadrons, including a TIE/D defender miniature, five ship cards, and four upgrade cards that invite you to outfit your ship with new systems, missiles, and cannons. Meanwhile, two Quick Build cards provide exciting combinations of pilots and upgrades, inviting you to see everything the ship can do.

card_list.name: •Rexler Brath
card_list.subtitle: Onyx Leader
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack that hits, if you are evading, expose 1 of the defender’s damage cards.<return><shipability><sabold>Full Throttle:</sabold> After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may perform an <evade> action.</shipability>

extensions.name: RZ-1 A-wing
extensions.description: The <italic>RZ-1 A-Wing Expansion Pack</italic> includes everything you need to add one of these speedy ships to your Rebel Alliance squadrons. An RZ-1 A-wing miniature painted in the colors of Phoenix Squadron is accompanied by four ship cards representing the Rebel pilots willing to take on the challenge of flying this craft. You can improve these pilots’ capabilities in battle with five upgrade cards of your choosing, or you can take the recommendations of two Quick Build cards for even more ways to use your RZ-1 A-wing.

card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After you perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0–1. That ship may perform a <focus> action.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Vectored Thrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> action.</shipability>

extensions.name: Major Vonreg's TIE
extensions.description:
As the personal ship of the First Order elite ace Major Baron Elrik Vonreg, the Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems TIE/ba Baron Space Superiority Interceptor strikes fear in the hearts of even the most grizzled Resistance pilots. 
Within this expansion, you’ll find six pilots ready to fight for the First Order, as well as six upgrade cards to fine-tune your TIE/ba interceptor’s capabilities. Accompanying these are two Quick Build cards with pre-built combinations of pilots and upgrades to help you get flying right away.

card_list.name: •Major Vonreg
card_list.subtitle: Red Baron
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>During the System Phase, you may choose 1<nonbreak>enemy ship in your<nonbreak><bullseye>. That ship gains 1<nonbreak>deplete or strain token of your choice.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Fine-Tuned Thrusters:</sabold> After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are not depleted or strained, you may gain 1<nonbreak>deplete or strain token to perform a<nonbreak><targetlock> or <barrelroll><nonbreak>action.</shipability>

extensions.name: Fireball
extensions.description:
A labor of love to the crew of Jarek Yeager’s garage, the Fireball is a highly combustible, scratch-built racing ship. Flown by undercover Resistance operative Kazuda Xiono, this explosion with wings is able to push the limit around the course before living up to its name.
The <italic>Fireball Expansion Pack</italic> contains everything you need to add one of these swift ships to your Resistance squadrons, including one Fireball miniature, four ship cards, and seven upgrade cards. Additionally, two Quick Build cards help you easily combine pilots and upgrades and get your Fireball to the start line as quickly as possible.

card_list.name: •Jarek Yeager
card_list.subtitle: Too Old for This
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you have 2<nonbreak>or fewer stress tokens, if you are damaged, you can execute red basic maneuvers even while stressed; if you are critically damaged, you can execute red advanced maneuvers even while stressed.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Explosion with Wings:</sabold> <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> You are dealt 1<nonbreak>facedown damage card. After you perform a <slam> action, you may expose 1<nonbreak>damage card to remove 1 disarm token.</shipability>

extensions.name: Never Tell Me the Odds Obstacles Pack
extensions.description:
In the vast depths of space, one can find countless wonders—comets with icy trails, nebulas filled with ionizing gas, or even living creatures, like mynocks, hiding within wreckage.

In addition to asteroids, debris fields, and gas clouds, the <italic>Never Tell Me the Odds Obstacles Pack</italic> contains six environment cards that reflect a few of the strange and terrifying places a space battle could erupt. Each environment card changes the placement or rules around obstacles, adding variety to your <italic>X-Wing</italic> games!

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Proton Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Spare Parts Canisters
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1<nonbreak>charge on one of your equipped <astro> upgrades. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

extensions.name: Fully Loaded Devices Pack
extensions.description: Set the timer and brace for detonation! The <italic>Fully Loaded Devices Pack</italic> collects numerous devices for <italic>X-Wing</italic>, giving you access to a vast arsenal of options for your squadrons. In addition to the upgrade cards and tokens for Proximity Mines, Conner Nets, Ion Bombs, and more, this devices pack contains six environment cards that use devices as part of setup. With these cards, you can battle in deadly minefields, fly your ships through star fields riddled with unexploded ordnance, or even maneuver to avoid continuous bombardments!

card_list.name: Trajectory Simulator
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

card_list.name: Bomblet Generator
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Conner Nets
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Proximity Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: •Electro-Proton Bomb
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return><smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template. Then place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.</smallbody><return><smallbody>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Delayed Fuses
card_list.ability_text: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.

card_list.name: Cluster Mines
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Cluster Mine set using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s<nonbreak><standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: Ion Bombs
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Ion Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

extensions.name: Hotshots and Aces Reinforcement Pack
extensions.description: Enhance your squadron options and launch new pilots with the <italic>Hotshots and Aces Reinforcements Pack</italic>! With upgrades available to all factions and new pilots for numerous ships in the Rebel, Imperial, Scum, Resistance, and First Order factions, you can now add iconic characters like Leia Organa, Captain Phasma, and K-2SO to your squads.

card_list.name: Barrage Rockets
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 or more <standardcharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

card_list.name: •<italic>Moldy Crow</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Gain a <frontarc> primary weapon with a value of “3.”<return>During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: •Maul
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.<return>You can equip “Dark Side” upgrades.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Ezra Bridger

card_list.name: •BT-1
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result for each stress token the defender has.
card_list.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

card_list.name: Composure
card_list.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

card_list.name: Agile Gunner
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: Advanced Optics
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a <hit> result.

card_list.name: Pattern Analyzer
card_list.ability_text: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

card_list.name: Primed Thrusters
card_list.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform <barrelroll> and <boost> actions even while stressed.

card_list.name: Hate
card_list.ability_text: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many <forcecharge>.

card_list.name: Predictive Shot
card_list.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

card_list.name: Brilliant Evasion
card_list.ability_text: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to change 2 of your <focus> results to <evade><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: Passive Sensors
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While your<nonbreak><standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your <standardcharge> is inactive, you may perform a<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><targetlock> action.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Autoblasters
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die. During the Neutralize Results step, if you are not in the defender’s<nonbreak><frontarc>, <evade><nonbreak>results do not cancel <crit><nonbreak>results.

card_list.name: Plasma Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

card_list.name: •Diamond-Boron Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, each ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 of the defender with agility equal to or less than the defender's rolls 1<nonbreak>attack die and suffers 1<nonbreak><hit>/<crit> damage for each matching result.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Angled Deflectors
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Starfighter shields often have manual overrides that allow them to be angled for increased front or rear protection. However, doing so leaves the ship exposed if the pilot’s situational awareness falters.</flavor>
card_list.restrictions_raw: Small or medium ship, Shield value of<nonbreak>1<nonbreak>or<nonbreak>more.

card_list.name: Snap Shot
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

card_list.name: Foresight
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> You may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Precognitive Reflexes
card_list.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><boost><nonbreak>action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on<nonbreak>your action bar, gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

card_list.name: Targeting Computer
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Targeting computers are standard features on many vessels, especially those designed to deliver ordnance. Some light starfighters and transport craft lack such weapons guidance, though it can be installed as an after-market modification.</flavor>

card_list.name: •K-2SO
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3.  That ship gains 1<nonbreak>calculate and 1<nonbreak>stress token.

card_list.name: Coaxium Hyperfuel
card_list.ability_text: You can perform the <slam> action even while stressed. If you do, you suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage unless you expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards.<return>After you partially execute a maneuver, you may expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards or suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to perform a <SLAM> action.

card_list.name: Mag-Pulse Warheads
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1<nonbreak><crit> damage and gains 1<nonbreak>deplete and 1<nonbreak>jam token. Then cancel all <hit>/<crit><nonbreak>results.

extensions.name: Huge Ship Conversion Kit
extensions.description: Launch your <italic>Star Wars</italic>™: X-Wing game into bigger battles with the <italic>Huge Ship Conversion Kit</italic>! This kit contains two huge plastic bases, four plastic pegs, and all the punchboard and cards you need to upgrade your huge ship experience from the First Edition to the Second Edition, including ship cards, upgrade cards, ship tokens, a new maneuver tool, new huge ship damage deck, and more!

card_list.name: Republic Judiciary
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Galactic Republic uses small, swift warships such as the CR90 corvette to respond rapidly to Separatist incursions across the galaxy.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Broadside Batteries:</sabold> You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1–4.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The <untalic>Raider</untalic>-class corvette is one of the Empire’s smallest warships, often used for reconnaissance missions, surgical strikes, or suppressing enemy starfighters with its powerful ordnance.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Concentrated Batteries:</sabold> While you perform a primary, <torpedo>, or <missile> attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

card_list.name: First Order Collaborators
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The First Order’s supporters make use of former Imperial vessels, such as the <untalic>Raider</untalic>-class corvette. Though it has outlived the regime that created it, this craft still spreads terror across the galaxy.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Concentrated Batteries:</sabold> While you perform a primary, <torpedo>, or <missile> attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Dorsal Turret
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

card_list.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

card_list.name: Cluster Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

card_list.name: Concussion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Novice Technician
card_list.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

card_list.name: Hotshot Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

card_list.name: Agile Gunner
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: Seismic Charges
card_list.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: •Admiral Ozzel
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly large or huge ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 executes a maneuver, it may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to execute a maneuver of the same bearing and difficulty of a speed 1<nonbreak>higher or lower instead.

card_list.name: •Azmorigan
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 2 friendly ships at range 0–1. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1<nonbreak>calculate or evade token.

card_list.name: •Captain Needa
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–4 reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, it sets its dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty and speed.

card_list.name: •Strategic Commander
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–4 reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, it sets its dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty and speed.

card_list.name: •Carlist Rieekan
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2 is destroyed, you may choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2. If you do, it may perform a red<nonbreak><evade><nonbreak>action.

card_list.name: •Jan Dodonna
card_list.ability_text: Friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0–3 can spend your focus and evade tokens.

card_list.name: •Raymus Antilles
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 gains 1<nonbreak>focus token.<return>After you are destroyed, you are not removed until the end of the End Phase.

card_list.name: •Stalwart Captain
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, you are not removed until the end of the End Phase.

card_list.name: Bombardment Specialists
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token to increase or decrease the range requirement by<nonbreak>1, to<nonbreak>a limit of<nonbreak>0–5.

card_list.name: Comms Team
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a <coordinate><nonbreak>action, you may spend up to 2<nonbreak><energycharge> to coordinate that many additional ships at range 0–1 of the ship you coordinated.

card_list.name: IG-RM Droids
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are calculating, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result to a <crit><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: Gunnery Specialists
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary or <hardpoint> attack, you may spend 1 or more <energycharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

card_list.name: Damage Control Team
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before you engage, you may spend 1 or more <energycharge> to flip that many of your <bitalic>Offline</bitalic><nonbreak>upgrade cards.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak>or<nonbreak>more<nonbreak><energycharge> to repair that many of your faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic><nonbreak>damage cards.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Ordnance Team
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform a <reload> action, you may spend up to 3<nonbreak><energycharge> to reload that many additional <standardcharge> on your equipped <missile>/<torpedo> upgrades.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform a <reload> action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><energycharge> to remove 1 disarm token.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Sensor Experts
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>You can maintain up to 3<nonbreak>locks on different objects.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform a <targetlock><nonbreak>action, you may spend up to 2<nonbreak><energycharge> to acquire a lock on that many other objects at range<nonbreak>0–1 of the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •Quick-Release Locks
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 <standardcharge> to drop 1 cargo crate drift in your <reararc> at range 0. It cannot overlap a ship this way..<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

card_list.name: •Saboteur’s Map
card_list.ability_text: At the end of Setup, you may spend up to 1 <standardcharge> from each of your equipped <bitalic>Mine</bitalic> upgrades to place the corresponding device in the play area beyond range 2 of any enemy ship, strategic marker, or other device.

card_list.name: •Scanner Baffler
card_list.ability_text: At the end of Setup, you may choose any number of other friendly, non-huge ships in your deployment area at range<nonbreak>0–1. If you do, place those ships anywhere in the same deployment area.

card_list.name: Adaptive Shields
card_list.ability_text: While another friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 defends, if it is a smaller size than you, you may spend 1 shield or 2<nonbreak><energycharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><crit> result.

card_list.name: Boosted Scanners
card_list.ability_text: While you lock, coordinate, or jam, you may spend up to 3 <nonbreak><energycharge> to increase the range at which you can choose an object by 1<nonbreak>per<nonbreak><energycharge> spent this way, to a maximum of range 5.

card_list.name: Optimized Power Core
card_list.ability_text: After you execute a blue maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><energycharge>.

card_list.name: Tibanna Reserves
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1 <standardcharge> to recover 2 <energycharge>.

card_list.name: •Toryn Farr
card_list.ability_text: After you coordinate a friendly ship, it may acquire a lock on a ship you are locking, ignoring range restrictions.

card_list.name: <italic>•Dodonna’s Pride</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><team> and <cargo> slots.

card_list.name: <italic>•Jaina’s Light</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 0–2 defends, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may spend 1 <energycharge>. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: <italic>•Liberator</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock up to 2<nonbreak>small ships.<return>After a ship deploys from you, it may perform a <focus><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><barrelroll><nonbreak>action.

card_list.name: <italic>•Tantive IV</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak>2<nonbreak><crew> slots.<return>While you defend, if the attacker is in your <reararc>, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: <italic>•Thunderstrike</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><gunner> slot.<return>While you perform a bonus attack, if you have not attacked the defender this round, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>attack die.

card_list.name: <italic>•Bright Hope</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can reinforce only your <fullfront>.<return>While you defend, if you are reinforced and the attacker is in your <fullfront>, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

card_list.name: <italic>•Luminous</italic>
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> You are placed in reserve.<return>At the end of setup, you are placed in the play area at range 0–2 of a friendly ship.

card_list.name: <italic>•Quantum Storm</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><team> and <cargo> slots.<return>After you fully execute a white maneuver, recover<nonbreak>1<nonbreak><energycharge>.

card_list.name: <italic>•Assailer</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><gunner> slot.<return>While you defend, if the attack range is<nonbreak>1, you may roll 1<nonbreak>additional defense die.

card_list.name: <italic>•Corvus</italic>
card_list.ability_text: You can dock up to 2<nonbreak>small ships.<return>After you perform a <calculate><nonbreak>action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

card_list.name: <italic>•Impetuous</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><crew> slot.<return>After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, you may perform a <focus><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><targetlock><nonbreak>action.

card_list.name: <italic>•Instigator</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><team> slot.<return>While you perform an attack, if the defender has an orange or red token, you may reroll up to 2<nonbreak>attack dice.

card_list.name: <italic>•Blood Crow</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><gunner> slot.<return>While you perform an attack at attack range<nonbreak>1–2, you may add 1<nonbreak><focus> result.

card_list.name: <italic>•Requiem</italic>
card_list.ability_text: After a ship deploys from you, it may acquire a lock on one ship you are locking, ignoring range restrictions.

card_list.name: <italic>•Suppressor</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><sensor> slot.<return>After you coordinate a friendly ship, you may spend 1 <energycharge> to jam an enemy ship at range 0–2 of that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

card_list.name: <italic>•Vector</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><crew> and <cargo> slots.<return>After a ship deploys from you, it may perform a <evade> or <boost> action.

card_list.name: <italic>•Broken Horn</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><crew> and <illicit> slots.<return>If you are damaged, reduce the difficulty of your speed 3–5 maneuvers.

card_list.name: <italic>•Merchant One</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><turret>, <team>, and <cargo><nonbreak>slots.<return><smallcaps>Bonus Attack:</smallcaps> Perform a<nonbreak><turret> attack.

card_list.name: <italic>•Insatiable Worrt</italic>
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><cargo> slot.<return>During the End Phase, you may recover 1<nonbreak>additional shield or 1 additional <energycharge>.

card_list.name: ••Corsair Refit
card_list.ability_text: Add<nonbreak><cannon>, <turret>, and <missile> slots.<return><smallcaps>Bonus Attack:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><energycharge> to perform a <cannon>, <turret>, or <missile> attack.

extensions.name: Epic Battles Multiplayer Expansion
extensions.description: Broaden the possibilities of your <italic>Star Wars</italic>™: X-Wing games with the Epic Battles Multiplayer Expansion! This expansion introduces a totally new way to play <italic>X-Wing</italic>, inviting two to eight players to engage in epic multiplayer battles as they command massive fleets in large-scale games that evoke iconic <italic>Star Wars</italic> scenes.

card_list.name: •Agent of the Empire
card_list.ability_text: You are a <bold>wing leader</bold>. Your<nonbreak>wingmates must be 2, 3, 4, or<nonbreak>5<nonbreak>TIE/ln<nonbreak>fighters.<return>While you defend, up to 2 of your wingmates in the attack arc may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> damage to cancel a matching result.

card_list.name: •First Order Elite
card_list.ability_text: You are a <bold>wing leader</bold>. Your<nonbreak>wingmates must be 2 or<nonbreak>3 TIE/fo<nonbreak>fighters or TIE/sf fighters.<return>While you defend, up to 2 of your wingmates in the attack arc may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> damage to cancel a<nonbreak>matching result.
card_list.restrictions_raw: First Order, TIE/sf fighter or TIE<nonbreak>/vn silencer

card_list.name: Veteran Wing Leader
card_list.ability_text: You are a <bold>wing leader</bold>. Your<nonbreak>wingmates must be 2, 3, 4, or<nonbreak>5<nonbreak>other ships of your ship type.<return>While you defend, up to 2 of your wingmates in the attack arc may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> damage to cancel a<nonbreak>matching result.

card_list.name: ••Dreadnought Hunter
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack against a huge ship, if the attack deals a faceup damage card to the defender and the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may apply the <bold>Precision Shot</bold> effect even if you are not in the specified arc.

extensions.name: Imperial Raider
extensions.description: An advanced patrol vessel developed by the Empire, the <italic>Raider</italic>-class Corvette is built to strike swiftly and decisively crush the embers of rebellion wherever they can be found. Capable of spewing out salvoes of ordnance or firing focused blasts at any target hapless enough to be caught in its killzone, the Raider is a terrifying opponent on the battlefield.

card_list.name: Outer Rim Patrol
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The <untalic>Raider</untalic>-class corvette is one of the Empire’s smallest warships, often used for reconnaissance missions, surgical strikes, or suppressing enemy starfighters with its powerful ordnance.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Concentrated Batteries:</sabold> While you perform a primary, <torpedo>, or <missile> attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

extensions.name: Tantive IV
extensions.description: With its powerful broadside batteries and advanced command capabilities, the CR90 Corellian Corvette has served as the cornerstone of strike forces since the days of the old Republic. Now these vessels are among the Rebellion’s most valuable warships, slipping Imperial blockades and delivering the decisive blow in space engagements.

card_list.name: Republic Judiciary
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Galactic Republic uses small, swift warships such as the CR90 corvette to respond rapidly to Separatist incursions across the galaxy.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Broadside Batteries:</sabold> You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1–4.</shipability>

extensions.name: C-ROC
extensions.description: The C-ROC Cruiser is the heaviest vessel available to many criminal operations, cartels, and syndicates in the Outer Rim, capable of carrying massive weapons batteries and unique dirty tricks that keep it one step ahead of the law. Whether it is hauling illicit cargo or marauding the hyperlanes in search of easy targets, the C-ROC is a flexible and dangerous craft.

card_list.name: Syndicate Smugglers
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Vessels like the C-ROC Cruiser allow criminal operations across the Outer Rim to move massive amounts of illicit materials, or project power that can bully small colonies into compliance.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Overdrive Burners:</sabold> While you defend, if your revealed maneuver is speed 3–5, roll 1 additional defense die.</shipability>

extensions.name: <italic>Xi</italic>-class Shuttle
extensions.description: The First Order's agents are scattered across the galaxy, from enclaves in the Unknown Regions to pockets of sympathizers within the New Republic. The Xi-class light shuttle is swift and lightly armed, suited to conveying First Order VIPs quickly but surreptitiously from base to base. It can also serve as a command craft, directing forces in raids before the attackers slip away into the depths of space once again.

card_list.name: •Commander Malarus

card_list.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 0–2 performs a primary attack, if it has 1 or more blank results, that ship <bold>must</bold> gain 1 strain token to reroll 1 blank result, if able.

card_list.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

card_list.name: Deadman’s Switch
card_list.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

card_list.name: Inertial Dampeners
card_list.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

card_list.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

card_list.name: Snap Shot
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

card_list.name: Deadeye Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <hit> result or change 1<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result to a <hit><nonbreak>result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Automated Target Priority
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform an attack, you <bold>must</bold> choose a defender at the closest valid attack range.</smallbody><return><smallbody> After you perform an attack that missed, place 1 calculate token on this card. <return></smallbody><smallbody> Before you engage, you may remove 1<nonbreak>calculate token from this card to gain a<nonbreak>matching token.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •Sensor Buoy Suite
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, place 2<nonbreak>sensor buoy remotes beyond range<nonbreak>2 of<nonbreak>any edge.</smallbody><return><smallbody>Before you engage, you may acquire a lock on a ship at range 0–1 of a friendly sensor buoy, ignoring range restrictions.</smallbody>
card_list.restrictions_raw: First Order, Medium or Large Ship

card_list.name: •Commander Pyre
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose an enemy ship. It gains 2<nonbreak>stress tokens.<return>While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.

extensions.name: Laat/i Gunship
extensions.description: A durable, reliable workhorse capable of serving in a wide array of environments, the LAAT/i gunship is renowned for getting the job done. Whether making precision drops of clone troopers on contested worlds, supporting Republic formations with interlaced fire in atmospheric battles, or engaging starfighters in the depths of space, the LAAT/i can be outfitted for nearly any role or battlefield.

card_list.name: •“Hawk”
card_list.subtitle: Valkyrie 2929
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the End Phase, each friendly ship at range 0–1 that has a revealed maneuver of speed 3–5 may gain 1 strain token to perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action.<smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Fire Convergence:</sabold> While a friendly ship performs a non-<turretarc> attack, if the defender is in your<nonbreak><turretarc>, you may spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, the attacker rerolls up to 2 attack dice.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Ion Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Agile Gunner
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

card_list.name: Deadeye Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <hit> result or change 1<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result to a <hit><nonbreak>result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Multi-Missile Pods
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<calculate> or <targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1 <standardcharge> to roll 1<nonbreak>additional attack die. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend up to 2 <standardcharge> to roll that many additional attack dice instead.

card_list.name: •Aayla Secura
card_list.ability_text: While an enemy ship in your <bullseye> performs an attack, if the defender is friendly and at range 0–2, the defender may change 1<nonbreak>blank result to a<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: •Kit Fisto
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1<nonbreak>friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 and spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, it may perform a red <evade> action.

card_list.name: •Plo Koon
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the End Phase, if you are reinforced, you may choose 1<nonbreak>friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0 or in your <leftarc> or <rightarc> at range<nonbreak>1. That ship removes 1<nonbreak>deplete or strain token, or repairs 1 faceup damage card.

card_list.name: •Yoda
card_list.ability_text: After another friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2 fully executes a purple maneuver or performs a purple action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship recovers<nonbreak>1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

card_list.name: •“Fives”
card_list.ability_text: After you perform an attack that missed, if the defender’s initiative is equal to or greater than your initiative, place 1 evade or focus token on this card.<return>Before you engage, you may remove 1 token from this card to gain 1<nonbreak>matching token.

card_list.name: •Wolfpack
card_list.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range 0–3 defends, if the attacker is in your firing arc, the defender may gain 1<nonbreak>strain token to acquire a lock on the attacker.

card_list.name: •Ghost Company
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a <turretarc> attack against a ship you have not attacked this round as a bonus attack.

card_list.name: •Clone Captain Rex
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><focus> result. If you do, each friendly ship that has the defender in its <bullseye> may gain 1 strain to perform a<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>action.

card_list.name: Suppressive Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><focus> result. If you do, the defender gains 1 deplete token unless it chooses to suffer 1 <hit> damage.

extensions.name: HMP Droid Gunship
extensions.description: A menacing silhouette slides overhead, repulsorlifts humming ominously and eyes glowing with malevolence. The HMP gunship's presence invokes fear thanks to predatory droid intelligence and an unpredictable capacity to strafe targets with devastating missile pods, bombs, and a wide-sweeping array of laser cannons.

card_list.name: •DGS-286
card_list.subtitle: Ambush Protocols
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0–1. That ship transfers 1 calculate token to you.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Networked Aim:</sabold> You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.</shipability>

card_list.name: •Kalani

card_list.name: Concussion Bombs
card_list.ability_text: During the System Phase, if any of this card’s <standardcharge> are inactive, you <bold>must</bold> spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop 1 concussion bomb using the [1 <straight>] template, if able. Otherwise, you may spend 1 <standardcharge> to drop 1 concussion bomb.

extensions.name: TIE/rb Heavy
extensions.description: The TIE/rb Heavy is one of the largest TIE variants for the Galactic Empire and is often assigned to patrol routes where it is expected to fight without the support of a carrier or escorts. Thanks to its robust armor, swiveling laser cannons, and integrated MGK-300 series droid intelligence, this vessel lives up to its nickname: the “Brute.”

card_list.name: •“Rampage”
card_list.subtitle: Implacable Pursuer
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After you execute a speed 3–4 maneuver, you may choose a ship in your<nonbreak><turretarc> at range<nonbreak>0–1. That ship gains 1 strain token, or 2 strain tokens if you are damaged.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Rotating Cannons:</sabold> You can rotate your <turretarc> indicator only to your <frontarc> or <reararc>. You <bold>must</bold> treat the <frontarc> requirement of your equipped <cannon><nonbreak>upgrades as <turretarc>.</shipability>

Its heavy armor and capacity to house an integrated MGK-300 droid co-pilot make it an excellent patrol craft.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Rotating Cannons:</sabold> You can rotate your <turretarc> indicator only to your <frontarc> or <reararc>.
