card_list.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

card_list.name: Ion Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Snap Shot
card_list.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

card_list.name: Deadeye Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <hit> result or change 1<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result to a <hit><nonbreak>result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Synced Laser Cannons
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If you are calculating, the defender does not apply the range bonus.

card_list.name: Ion Limiter Override
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may perform a <barrelroll> action, even while stressed. If you do, roll an attack die; on a <hit> result gain 1 strain token, and on a <crit> result gain 1 ion token.

card_list.name: Maneuver-Assist MGK-300
card_list.ability_text: Reduce the difficulty of your speed<nonbreak>3 straight (<straight>) and bank (<leftbank> or <rightbank>) maneuvers.

card_list.name: Target-Assist MGK-300
card_list.ability_text: Before you engage, if you have no green tokens and you are not stressed, gain 1 calculate token for each enemy ship at range 2–3 in your firing arc, to a maximum of 2.

extensions.name: Heralds of Hope
extensions.description: The spark of hope has ignited! The Resistance rises to meet the First Order in one final confrontation to determine the fate of the galaxy. New T-70 X-Wing and RZ-2 A-Wing pilots join iconic heroes like Poe Dameron and Temmin “Snap” Wexley  as they seek to break the First Order’s tyrannical hold over the galaxy.

card_list.name: Red Squadron Expert
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Although the bulk of the Resistance Starfighter Corps is made up of young volunteers from the New Republic, their ranks are bolstered by veterans of the Galactic Civil War determined to finish what they started decades ago.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>The Incom-FreiTek T-70 X-Wing was designed to improve upon the tactical flexibility of the venerable T-65. The starfighter’s advanced droid socket is compatible with a wide array of astromechs, and its modular weapons pods allow ground crews to tailor its payload for specific missions.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform an attack, you <bold>must</bold> choose a defender at the closest valid attack range.</smallbody><return><smallbody> After you perform an attack that missed, place 1 calculate token on this card. <return></smallbody><smallbody> Before you engage, you may remove 1<nonbreak>calculate token from this card to gain a<nonbreak>matching token.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Backwards Tailslide
card_list.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, if your equipped<nonbreak><config><nonbreak>upgrade has the “(Closed)” side faceup, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you boost or barrel roll through an obstacle, if you are not at range<nonbreak>0 of it, gain 1<nonbreak>evade token.

card_list.name: Starbird Slash
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose 1 enemy ship you moved through. That ship gains 1<nonbreak>strain token. Then, if you are in that ship’s firing arc, you gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.

card_list.name: Underslung Blaster Cannon
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a bonus attack.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps>Your dice can be modified only by spending a lock for the default effect.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •R6-D8
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly ships at range 0–3 that have the defender in their <bullseye>.

card_list.name: •R2-D2
card_list.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and 1<nonbreak>shield to remove 1<nonbreak>red token.<return>During the End Phase, if you have no active shields, you may spend 2<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1<nonbreak>shield and gain 1<nonbreak>deplete token.

card_list.name: •Overdrive Thruster
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <boost>, <barrelroll>, or <SLAM> action, you <bold>must</bold> use a template of 1<nonbreak>speed higher, if able.

extensions.name: Eta-2 <italic>Actis</italic>
extensions.description: Th Eta-2 <italic>Actis</italic> expansion puts this agile Jedi starfighter as well as a Syliure-class Hyperspace Ring at your command. Meanwhile, six ship cards offer an array of the galaxy's most notable Jedi Knights to fly it into battle and six upgrade cards invite you to customize the ship with a new astromech, additional Force abilities, and more!

card_list.name: •Anakin Skywalker
card_list.subtitle: Hero of Coruscant
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>After you or a friendly <smallcaps>Obi-Wan Kenobi</smallcaps> ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 executes a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range 0–1 of that ship, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship removes 1<nonbreak>red token of your choice.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Intuitive Controls:</sabold> During the System Phase, you may perform a purple<nonbreak><barrelroll> or purple<nonbreak><boost><nonbreak>action.</shipability>

card_list.name: TransGalMeg Control Link
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><sabold>Hyperspace Docking Ring:</sabold> 1 Delta-7 Aethersprite, Eta-2 Actis, or Nimbus-class V-wing can dock with you.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While a ship is docked with you, treat your initiative as that ship’s initiative. You are assigned that ship's dial. While you execute a basic maneuver, treat its speed as 1. Before you would execute an advanced maneuver, execute a stationary maneuver [0<nonbreak><stationary>] instead.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While no ship is docked with you, you are not assigned a maneuver dial, and do not activate or engage.<smallbody>

card_list.name: Marg Sabl Closure
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through an obstacle, structure, or huge ship, or if you deployed, you may choose 1<nonbreak>enemy ship in your<nonbreak><frontarc> at range<nonbreak>1–2. That ship gains 1<nonbreak>strain token.

card_list.name: Extreme Maneuvers
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a <boost><nonbreak>action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to use the turn (<leftturn><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><rightturn>) template instead.

card_list.name: Patience
card_list.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your<nonbreak><frontarc>, you may gain 1 deplete token to recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

card_list.name: <italic>Syliure</italic>-31 Hyperdrive
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> You can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond range 1 of obstacles, beyond range 3 of enemy ships, and beyond range 3 of the enemy table edge.

card_list.name: •R2-D2
card_list.ability_text: After you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1<nonbreak>deplete token to repair 1<nonbreak>damage card, recover 1<nonbreak>shield, or remove 1<nonbreak>device at range<nonbreak>0–1.

extensions.name: <italic>Nimbus</italic>-class V-wing
extensions.description: The Nimbus<italic>-class V-wing Expansion Pack</italic> contains everything you need to incorporate one of these versatile starfighters into your Galactic Republic squadrons, including a beautifully pre-painted miniature and six ship cards that allow you to hand pick your pilot. Meanwhile, seven upgrade cards give you the freedom to customize your ship with new astromechs, two different configurations, and more!

card_list.name: •“Odd Ball”
card_list.subtitle: CC-2237
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your<nonbreak><bullseye>, you may acquire a lock on that ship.<return><shipability><sabold>Twin Ion Engines:</sabold> Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.</shipability>

card_list.name: Ion Limiter Override
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may perform a <barrelroll> action, even while stressed. If you do, roll an attack die; on a <hit> result gain 1 strain token, and on a <crit> result gain 1 ion token.

card_list.name: •R7-A7
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result to a <crit><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: Q7 Astromech
card_list.ability_text: While you barrel roll or boost, you can move through and overlap obstacles.

card_list.name: Thermal Detonators
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend up to 2<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop that many Thermal Detonators using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] or [2<nonbreak><straight>] template. Each must be placed using a different template.<return>When you reload this card, recover 1<nonbreak>additional<nonbreak><standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Alpha-3B “Besh”
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, you may spend your lock on the defender to change 1<nonbreak>of your blank or<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>results to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.<return>Add <bomb><nonbreak>slot.

card_list.name: Alpha-3E “Esk”
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform a primary attack, before rolling attack dice, you may spend 2<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, your <crit><nonbreak>results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.</smallbody>

extensions.name: Droid Tri-Fighter
extensions.description: Within the <italic>Droid Tri-fighter Expansion Pack</italic> you'll find everything you need to add one of these aggressive droids to your Separatist squadrons, beginning with a beautifully detailed, pre-painted Droid Tri-Fighter miniature. This miniature is accompanied by six ship cards inviting you to choose a specific set of programming for it as well as seven upgrade cards that give you the freedom to outfit it with a variety of weapons, systems, and more!

card_list.name: •DIS-T81
card_list.subtitle: Clever Circuits
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token from a friendly ship in the enemy ship’s firing arc to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to an <evade> or <hit><nonbreak>result.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Networked Calculations:</sabold> While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token from a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to an<nonbreak><evade><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.</shipability>

card_list.name: Separatist Interceptor
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Deployed late in the Clone Wars, these aggressive starfighters, and the destructive buzz droids they carry, pose a serious threat to even veteran Jedi pilots.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Networked Calculations:</sabold> While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token from a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to an <evade> or<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.</shipability>

card_list.name: Colicoid Interceptor
card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and manufactured by Phlac-Arphocc Automata Industries, the heuristic processors of Droid Tri-Fighters allow these deadly ships to analyze and adapt to enemy tactics in-flight.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Networked Calculations:</sabold> While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token from a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to an <evade> or<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.</shipability>

card_list.name: Fire-Control System
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

card_list.name: •••Discord Missiles
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token and 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to launch 1<nonbreak>buzz droid swarm using the [3<nonbreak><leftbank>], [3<nonbreak><straight>], or [3<nonbreak><rightbank>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

card_list.name: Marg Sabl Closure
card_list.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through an obstacle, structure, or huge ship, or if you deployed, you may choose 1<nonbreak>enemy ship in your<nonbreak><frontarc> at range<nonbreak>1–2. That ship gains 1<nonbreak>strain token.

card_list.name: Independent Calculations
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody>Replace your <smallcaps>Networked Calculations</smallcaps> ship ability with the following:</smallbody><return><sasmall><sabold>Independent Calculations:</sabold> While you perform a white <calculate><nonbreak>action, you may treat it as red to gain 1<nonbreak>additional calculate token. Other ships cannot spend your calculate tokens using the <smallcaps>Networked Calculations</smallcaps> ship ability.</sasmall>

card_list.name: Precision Ion Engines
card_list.ability_text: Before you execute a speed<nonbreak>1–3 Koiogran Turn (<kturn>) maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to execute that maneuver as a Segnor’s Loop (<leftsloop><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><rightsloop>) maneuver instead.

extensions.name: Jango Fett's <italic>Slave I</italic>
extensions.description: This expansion pack lets you put your personal touch on your own <italic>Firespray</italic>-class patrol craft painted in the colors of Jango Fett's <italic>Slave I</italic>. In addition to the miniature, you'll also find four ship cards in this expansion, including the infamous Jango Fett himself, along with 13 upgrade cards that let you customize your ship to fit your strategy.

card_list.name: •Jango Fett
card_list.subtitle: Simple Man
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the difficulty of your revealed maneuver is less than that of the enemy ship’s, you may change 1<nonbreak>of the enemy ship’s <focus><nonbreak>results to a blank result.

card_list.ability_text: <flavor>Emboldened by the bitter stalemate of the Outer Rim Sieges, mercenary groups across the galaxy take the opportunity to profit from the ongoing war.</flavor>

card_list.name: Debris Gambit
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

card_list.name: Jamming Beam
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

card_list.name: Ablative Plating
card_list.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

card_list.name: Deadeye Shot
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <hit> result or change 1<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result to a <hit><nonbreak>result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

card_list.name: Suppressive Gunner
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><focus> result. If you do, the defender gains 1 deplete token unless it chooses to suffer 1 <hit> damage.

card_list.name: •Hondo Ohnaka
card_list.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Choose 2 ships at range<nonbreak>1–3 of you that are friendly to each other. Coordinate one of the chosen ships, then jam the other, ignoring range restrictions.

card_list.name: •Jango Fett
card_list.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend your lock on the enemy ship to change 1<nonbreak>of the enemy ship’s <focus><nonbreak>results to a blank result.

card_list.name: •Zam Wesell
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 2<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return>During the System Phase, you may assign 1 of your secret conditions to yourself facedown:<return><smallcaps>You Should Thank Me</smallcaps><return><smallcaps>You’d Better Mean Business</smallcaps>

card_list.name: •Boba Fett
card_list.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if there are no other ships in the attack arc, you may change 1<nonbreak>of your <focus><nonbreak>results to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.

card_list.name: Weapons Systems Officer
card_list.ability_text: After you perform a special attack with the <targetlock> requirement, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

card_list.name: Thermal Detonators
card_list.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend up to 2<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop that many Thermal Detonators using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] or [2<nonbreak><straight>] template. Each must be placed using a different template.<return>When you reload this card, recover 1<nonbreak>additional<nonbreak><standardcharge>.</smallbody>

card_list.name: •<italic>Slave I</italic>
card_list.ability_text: While you perform a<nonbreak><frontarc><nonbreak>attack, if you are in the defender’s full rear arc, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result to a<nonbreak><crit><nonbreak>result.<return>Add<nonbreak><gunner><nonbreak>slot.

card_list.name: False Transponder Codes
card_list.ability_text: After you acquire a lock on an object or an object acquires a lock on you, if you have 1<nonbreak>active<nonbreak><standardcharge>, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and jam that object, ignoring range restrictions.
